articles.content: There are always two sides to a story and in Rinku Singh and Yash Dayal's case, they are drastically different. The Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) batter, after hitting five consecutive sixes when 28 ru… [+3134 chars]

articles.title: "They must be feeling proud about saving that money" - Ex-Kerala Blasters assistant Stephan van der Heyden on salary row, Karolis Skinkys, and more - Sportskeeda
articles.description: The weeks leading up to the Hero Super Cup were meant to be quiet for Kerala Blasters FC; an opportunity to catch their breath after a taxing Indian Super League campaign.
articles.content:
